Summary: Round, 150-200 ft diamater, luminated different colors of lights,fast, no noise
divs: sighting detailsi was 12 years old i went night fishing with my brother and 4 friends ages ranged from 12 to 18 years old. we walked about 3 miles out of town it was around 9-10pm. it was very quiet and dark, my 2 friends and i left to a different fishing spot while my brother and 2 friends stayed in the same fixhing spot like 1\4 of a mile apart from we were.while we were fishing a round object with bright lights with different colors out of nowhere stoped very fast across the road approx 400 yards away from us (very close)and it hoverd low over a field 200ft of the ground for 1 min. it dropped around 50ft so fast and hovered with no noise for 2 min we did not speak to each other we just stared at the object i was asking my self what is that i never seen any thing so fast.and i had a feelimg as if somthing was after the object. after it hovered it left so fast that i remember seeing streaks of lights behind it. after the object left my friends and i began to walk back to my brother and my other friends, as we approached my friend alex he asked us "did you see that shit" i was scared and wanted to go home my friends were acting as if they were no scared but i think they were. my mom picked us up down the road from we were at earlier and we told her right away. we got home and i told my dad with exitement becuase i was not scared any more. ever since that day i have had special interest and researched ufo's.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brawley
There were no other sightings in Brawley on or around August 31st 1992
